QuestData.Title: Hints From The Past
QuestData.Description: There is much to learn of this place, yet it does not yield its secrets willingly.$b$bSomething you mentioned the last time that we spoke intrigues me. This Mistweaver Ai, she carries a time-worn journal, if I recall? This may be the answer to many of our questions, or it may simply raise more. I suppose that it all depends on the diligence of the explorer that put pen to paper in this preposterous place.$b$bObtain a time-worn journal and return to me with it. We shall delve into its mysteries together.
QuestData.LogDescription: Purchase a Time-Worn Journal from Mistweaver Ai.
